Play with Kubernetes Classroom

The Play with Kubernetes classroom brings you labs and tutorials that help you get hands-on experience using Kubernetes. Currently we only offer one extensive workshop:

Kubernetes Hands-on Workshop



We plan on offering more as time goes on. In the meantime you might find the Play with Docker Classroom provides you with a wealth of other workshop and hands on labs to learn more about Docker.

Learn more →
